name: Mendips Stone
overview: A train simulation and management game that covers the Mendip Rail line, an independent freight operating railway company in Great Britain. The company operates aggregate trains from the quarries of the Mendip Hills in South-West England, to London and South-East England. The Foster Yeoman quarries are at Torr Works and Dulcote Quarry, while Hanson has plants at Batts Combe Quarry and Whatley Quarry. It's up to you to keep trains running on time and keep the coal fires burning.
